remarks: Under subset ordering, the intersection of a restricted class abstraction is less than or equal to any of its members.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2013.)
statement:
intminss.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
intminss $p |- ( ( A e. B /\ ps ) -> |^| { x e. B | ph } C_ A ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ps x $.
